inclusion.criterion: Class I indication for MV Surgery according to ESC/EACTS and AHA/ACC guidelines: Symptomatic patients and/or LV dysfunction : LVESD ≥45 mm and/or 30≤ LVEF ≤60%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Leaflet prolapse of P2 and/or A2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Candidates for surgical mitral valve repair according to heart team
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient able to sign an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient benefiting from a social insurance system or a similar system
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Asymptomatic patients with preserved LV function
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Complex mechanism of MR (leaflet perforation, severe calcifications, commissural extension, etc)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Predicted post-repair coaptation length less than 4 mm
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation and is symptomatic. However, she was lost to follow-up and remains symptomatic despite being prepared for surgery.
